name: NoBlockKBC++
tagline: GNU C++ Class for non-blocking keyboard input in Linux Terminal (as well as Windows Console for compatibility)
body:
### General Info A simple c++ header file that contains a class with functions to perform simple keyboard input checking in a Linux Terminal as well as a Windows Console, to simplify prototype development on the two platforms. ### Download There are three buttons at the very top of this page. The one on the left will take you to the github page for this project, while the two on the right will package the project into a compressed file type of your choosing. ### Authors and Contact Author: @mikeypro83
Contact: For professional inquiries only! michaelscottstuart at yahoo dot com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
